compatibility.notes: TAPR-OHL-1.0 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL and AGPL.

key_requirements: Include the complete package of documentation when distributing unmodified documentation.
Make documentation available for three years upon request.
License any modifications under the same OHL license.
license.name: TAPR-OHL-1.0
obligations: Distribute unmodified documentation with the complete package.
Make documentation available for at least three years upon request.
Include modifications following the stated requirements.
Attempt to notify original developers of modifications via email.
